Author: Haselnussbomber
Name: HaselTweaks
Punchline: A collection of quality of life tweaks.
Changelog:
Inventory Highlight

- Fixed: Hovering HQ items would not highlight similar items when "Ignore item quality" was enabled.

Author: Haselnussbomber
Name: LeveHelper
Description: A little helper to check which Levequests have been completed and which are missing.
Changelog:
- The target framework has been updated to .NET 8, some code has been adjusted to take advantage of the additions it brings, and the NoAlloq dependency was removed.
- The plugin now loads early and asynchronously.
- Added: A little cog icon to access the settings has been added to the LeveHelper window.
- Fixed: The location and type filter buttons now save the configuration after setting the filter.

Author: Haselnussbomber
Name: MogMogCheck
Description: MogMogCheck is a small plugin to assist you in tracking the rewards of the Moogle Treasure Trove event (called Mog Mog Kollektion in German, hence the name).
Punchline: Tracking assistant for Moogle Treasure Trove rewards
Changelog:
The target framework has been updated to .NET 8, some code has been adjusted to take advantage of the additions it brings, and the NoAlloq dependency was removed.

No further changes on the plugin itself.

Author: Haselnussbomber
Name: Yo-kai Check
Description: Yo-kai Check is a small plugin to assist you in tracking the rewards of the Yo-kai Watch event.
Punchline: Tracking assistant for Yo-kai Watch rewards
Changelog:
- Added: A DTR service has been added to show the medal count of the medal you're currently farming in the server info bar. This can be disabled in the Dalamud Settings. It will also automatically hide when you switch zones.
- Fixed: Minion/weapon mapping was incorrect. Very sorry about that! (I learned it the hard way by farming 10 medals of a weapon I already had...)
